items.sentence: You don\'t have to digitize everything, Tom.
You have to strike the iron while it\'s hot.
I warned you not to get near him, didn\'t I?
Have you ever seen the person in this photo?
Tom doesn\'t think this is such a good idea.
Tom doesn\'t understand the value of saving.
Tom doesn\'t want a ukulele made of plastic.
Tom doesn\'t yet know what happened to Mary.
Tom dropped Mary off at her friend\'s house.
I spent a lot of time here when I was a kid.
I suggest that you go to Australia with Tom.
I\'ve got a feeling something\'s gone wrong.
I assume you haven\'t seen Tom this morning.
I believe you\'ve been trying to contact us.
I forgot Tom knew how to play the accordion.
I have to think about what needs to be done.
Aren\'t you afraid of losing all your money?
Aren\'t you going to go to Boston next week?
Aren\'t you going to see Tom this afternoon?
I just wanted to check to see if you\'re OK.
Tom bought some apples and made apple sauce.
Tom called Mary to ask if everything was OK.
Tom came back to Boston for a class reunion.
Tom came in carrying three cups of espresso.
Tom was sitting quietly in the waiting room.
We had a very interesting time in Australia.
Tom said Mary was the one who told him that.
Mary is still in love with her ex-boyfriend.
Tom is supposed to help Mary do the laundry.
Tom is talking with somebody in the hallway.
Tom is telling his children a bedtime story.
Tom is the guy we met in the park yesterday.
Tom is the most valuable player on our team.
I\'ve already told the police what happened.
I\'ve already told you that a million times.
I\'ve always wanted to know what that meant.
If you don\'t know the way, ask a policeman.
Mary is wearing two sweaters under her coat.
Tom can swim just about as well as Mary can.
Tom opened the window to get some fresh air.
Tom persuaded Mary to study French with him.
Tom phoned to say he would be a little late.
Can\'t you shut your trap for a few minutes?
Tom is the only close friend I\'ve got here.
Tom couldn\'t resist Mary\'s sad puppy look.
Are you sure Tom isn\'t allergic to peanuts?
By the time you get back, she\'ll have left.
Tom is responding well to the new treatment.
Tom wants me to help Mary with her homework.
Tom was angry because Mary was ignoring him.
